channel.title: Risks and technical debt on K.S.C.H. Workflows Architecture Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Risks and technical debt on K.S.C.H. Workflows Architecture Documentation

item.title: Ivory tower
item.description: KSCH Workflows might be an ivory tower solution which doesn’t fulfil the needs of the KSCH staff.

item.title: Truck factor
item.description: The KSCH Workflows project might come to a hold when a project member is hit by the proverbial truck.

item.title: Legal
item.description: KSCH Workflows might violate legal regulation.
